articles.description: The show's executive producer on Wednesday said Lady Gaga will not perform at the show in Los Angeles Sunday, as she 'is in the middle of shooting' of Joker: Folie à Deux.
articles.content:
Lady Gaga will not be performing this year at the Academy Awards, where she's nominated for Best Original Song for Hold My Hand, her track from the blockbuster Top Gun: Maverick.

articles.author: Jason P. Frank
articles.title: SNL: Jenna Ortega Does Wednesday Dance With PDD - Vulture
articles.description: Jenna Ortega and the Please Don’t Destroy boys released a ‘Saturday Night Live’ promo in which they do Wednesday Addams’s dance from ‘Wednesday’ to Lady Gaga’s “Bloody Mary” ahead of her episode on March 11 with musical guest the 1975.
articles.content: Jenna Ortega begs SNL to please not destroy her spirit before her March 11 appearance, but the people want to see her iconic-if-soul-crushing Wednesday dance. After all, since SNL promos come out on … [+517 chars]

articles.author: Alyssa Guzman
articles.title: Priscilla Presley and Lisa Marie were 'barely speaking' before she died - Daily Mail
articles.description: Lisa Marie reportedly resented her mother Priscilla, 77, for siding with her ex-husband Michael Lockwood, 61, as the pair battled it out for the custody of their twins.
articles.content:
Priscilla Presley and Lisa Marie were 'barely speaking' prior to the latter's death after she sided with her daughter's ex-husband Michael Lockwood during a bitter custody battle over their twins.
